Posts.Content: the waiting is the worst part - I am 3 years down the track from my breast cancer diagnosis. Waiting for test results is the hardest - I clean out cupboards and rearrange the house etc to keep busy and help the days pass. There isn't anything else you can do except count down the days. Fingers crossed that this is nothing - keep us posted as to how you go.
Posts.Title: Lump grew to 6 cm in a month.
